habitat_description: The range begins in southeastern Oregon and southern Idaho into northeastern and western California, Nevada, western and central lowlands of Utah, and western Arizona (Stebbins 2003). In Arizona, it occupies the western and northern desertscrub (Brennan and Holycross 2009). Found in the deserts of northwestern Nevada, western Utah, southeastern Oregon, and southwestern Idaho in association with plants as Shadscale, Big Greasewood, Spiny Hopsage, Bud Sagebrush, and Big Sagebrush (St. John 2002).
